description: I co-host Ruby for All alongside Julie J, a podcast catered to junior web developers. Each week we break down topics to help Juniors get hired and succeed as Rubyists.
title: Ruby for All

description: I co-host the Remote Ruby podcast with Chris Oliver and Jason Charnes, where we interview brilliant people in the community and discuss current events in the Ruby ecosystem.
title: Remote Ruby

description: For the first half of 2020, I co-hosted The Ruby Blend alongside Nate Hopkins and Ron Cooke. We ended the show in September, 2020.
title: The Ruby Blend
Ruby Rogues
description: I joined Ruby Rogues as a panelist in late 2018 and stayed until the end of 2019. This is where I got my start in podcasting and began making friends in the community.
